mapper.select: SELECT JB.NO, TITLE, NICKNAME, WRITEDATE, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, FLOOR(ENDDATE - SYSDATE) "DDAY", STARTJOB, ENDJOB, SALARY, CD1.VALUE "SALTYPE", CD2.VALUE "JOBTYPE", VIEWCOUNT, CD3.VALUE "TYPE", CD4.VALUE "STATUS" FROM DC_BOARD_JOB_TB JB JOIN DC_BOARD_TB B ON(B.NO = JB.BOARDNO) JOIN DC_MEMBER_TB M ON(M.NO = B.MEMBERNO) JOIN DC_CODE_TB CD1 ON(CD1.ID = JB.SALTYPE) JOIN DC_CODE_TB CD2 ON(CD2.ID = JB.JOBTYPE) JOIN DC_CODE_TB CD3 ON(CD3.ID = JB.TYPE) JOIN DC_CODE_TB CD4 ON(CD4.ID = B.STATUS) WHERE B.STATUS != 'STATUS002' ORDER BY JB.NO DESC

SELECT JB.NO, TITLE, NICKNAME, WRITEDATE, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, FLOOR(ENDDATE - SYSDATE) "DDAY", STARTJOB, ENDJOB, SALARY, CD1.VALUE "SALTYPE", CD2.VALUE "JOBTYPE", VIEWCOUNT, CD3.VALUE "TYPE", CD4.VALUE "STATUS" FROM DC_BOARD_JOB_TB JB JOIN DC_BOARD_TB B ON(B.NO = JB.BOARDNO) JOIN DC_MEMBER_TB M ON(M.NO = B.MEMBERNO) JOIN DC_CODE_TB CD1 ON(CD1.ID = JB.SALTYPE) JOIN DC_CODE_TB CD2 ON(CD2.ID = JB.JOBTYPE) JOIN DC_CODE_TB CD3 ON(CD3.ID = JB.TYPE) JOIN DC_CODE_TB CD4 ON(CD4.ID = B.STATUS) WHERE B.STATUS != 'STATUS002' AND NICKNAME = #{nickName} ORDER BY JB.NO DESC

SELECT JB.NO, TITLE, NICKNAME, CONTENT, WRITEDATE, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, FLOOR(ENDDATE - SYSDATE) "DDAY", LOCATION, STARTJOB, ENDJOB, SALARY, CD1.VALUE "JOBTYPE", CD2.VALUE "JOBTYPE", VIEWCOUNT, CD3.VALUE "TYPE", CD4.VALUE "STATUS" FROM DC_BOARD_JOB_TB JB JOIN DC_BOARD_TB B ON(B.NO = JB.BOARDNO) JOIN DC_MEMBER_TB M ON(M.NO = B.MEMBERNO) JOIN DC_CODE_TB CD1 ON(CD1.ID = JB.SALTYPE) JOIN DC_CODE_TB CD2 ON(CD2.ID = JB.JOBTYPE) JOIN DC_CODE_TB CD3 ON(CD3.ID = JB.TYPE) JOIN DC_CODE_TB CD4 ON(CD4.ID = B.STATUS) WHERE JB.NO = #{no}
